name: LiveTrackings - V24 MULTILINGUAL (FR, ES, DE, IT, NL)

parameters.query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS offers;

CREATE TABLE offers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    partner_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    affiliate_link TEXT NOT NULL,
    primary_keyword TEXT NOT NULL,
    target_country TEXT NOT NULL,
    subdirectory TEXT NOT NULL,
    language_code TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'en',
    slug TEXT,
    status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending'
);

INSERT INTO offers (partner_name, affiliate_link, primary_keyword, target_country, subdirectory, status, language_code) VALUES
-- English (EN)
('Compensair', 'https://tp.media/r?marker=605475&trs=488170&p=4129&u=https%3A%2F%2Fcompensair.com&campaign_id=86', 'flight delay compensation', 'Global', 'claims', 'pending', 'en'),

parameters.jsonBody:
{"contents":[{"parts":[{"text":"You are a native {{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.language_code }} SEO Content Specialist for a package tracking website. Write a premium 800-word SEO guide about {{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.primary_keyword }} in {{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.language_code }}. MANDATORY: Include this affiliate link {{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.affiliate_link }} naturally in the first paragraph as an inline HTML anchor. Use semantic HTML:

for main sections,

for subsections,

for body text, and

    for lists. Focus on courier tracking, delivery status, and shipping information. Write naturally in the target language. Return ONLY the HTML content, no markdown."}]}],"generationConfig":{"temperature":0.7,"maxOutputTokens":2048}}

{"filename":"={{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.primary_keyword.toLowerCase().replace(/ /g, '-') }}.html","language":"={{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.language_code }}","subdirectory":"={{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.subdirectory }}","affiliate_link":"={{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.affiliate_link }}","html":{{ JSON.stringify($node['AI Content Writer'].json.candidates[0].content.parts[0].text) }}}

parameters.query: UPDATE offers SET status = 'published' WHERE id = '{{ $node['Fetch Pending Offers'].json.id }}';
